home.title: Teambee
home.hero_title: We beat the short with the long term
home.hero_subtitle: Teambee helps premium health and wellness centers transform members into loyal ambassadors through MyWellness CRM, with personalized attention and customized customer journeys for sustainable growth.

about.title: Let's win together!
about.subtitle: Teamwork is our strength. With data and personalized attention, we create synergy between health and wellness centers and their members for sustainable growth.
about.teamwork_text: At Teambee, it's all about collaboration. We connect clubs and members with tailored solutions, leading to mutual success and long-term relationships.
about.results_text: Our focus is on measurable results: higher member retention, satisfied members, and increasing revenue for clubs.
about.sustainable_text: We build sustainable relationships that ensure stable growth and long-term success for clubs.

services.title: Happy, healthy members mean sustainable growth
services.subtitle: Our proven 5-step approach ensures strategic, data-driven growth for your fitness club:
services.strategy: Strategy – Together, we develop a personalized approach that perfectly fits your club and members.
services.design: Design – We design Customer Journeys that truly resonate with members and keep them engaged long-term.
services.implementation_detail: Implementation – Seamless integration with MyWellness CRM and automated workflows for maximum efficiency.
services.education: Education – Training and guidance of your team on-site for successful execution of the strategy.
services.data_support: Data support – Continuous monitoring and optimization of results for constant growth.
services.data_support_subtitle: Our data support ensures continuous growth and keen insight into your club performance, team and members:
services.data_support_inzicht: Insight – Monthly Club Performance Report with data on club performance, retention, and team performance (coming soon through your own login page).
services.data_support_actie: Action – Make data-driven choices based on behavior, trends, and KPIs.
services.data_support_retentie: Retention – Concrete figures on member retention that allow you to focus on improving retention and preventing cancellations
services.data_support_team: Team – Steer more effectively with insight into team impact and performance.
services.data_support_groei: Growth – Continuous optimization and, with Premium, extra support and implementation hours for lasting innovation.

benefits.title: The best-scored goal is the goal we achieve
benefits.subtitle: Discover how Teambee transforms the member experience and stimulates sustainable growth.
benefits.retention_text: On average, our clients see a member retention rate of 73%, far above industry standards.
benefits.referral_text: Members become ambassadors, generating 3.8x more recommendations than traditional marketing.
benefits.engagement_text: Members show 68% more engagement with personalized journeys and attention.

reviews.title: What our clients say
reviews.subtitle: Discover how Teambee is transforming fitness clubs.

login.title: Login to your dashboard
login.subtitle: Get access to your personal Teambee dashboard to gain insight into your club's performance
login.coming_soon_text: We're busy developing this feature. Keep an eye on our updates – coming soon!

footer.description: Teambee helps fitness clubs worldwide bind members and achieve sustainable growth with smart technology and a personal approach.

dashboard.title: Teambee Dashboard
dashboard.welcome_subtitle: Use the user menu in the top right to update your password or invite new users to your club.
dashboard.admin_viewing_subtitle: You are viewing this club's dashboard as an administrator.
dashboard.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
dashboard.invite_subtitle: Invite a new user to join your club by sending them a registration link.
dashboard.email_help: Enter the email address of the person you want to invite

password_reset.title: Reset Password
password_reset.request_subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
password_reset.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_reset.invalid_expired_message: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.services_subtitle: Tell us about your club and we'll show you how Teambee can help you grow.
contact.success_message: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error_message: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again.
contact.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address

messages.missing_credentials: Please enter both email and password
messages.invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
messages.account_locked: Your account has been temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please try again later.
messages.password_too_short: New password must be at least 8 characters long
messages.only_club_users_invite: Only club users can invite new users
messages.valid_email_required: Please enter a valid email address
messages.password_reset_sent: Password reset link has been sent to your email address if it exists in our system.
messages.password_reset_success: Password reset successfully! You can now log in with your new password.
messages.registration_success: Registration completed successfully! You can now log in with your new account.
messages.password_min_8_chars: Password must be at least 8 characters long

password_reset.subject: Teambee - Password Reset Request
password_reset.title: Password Reset Request
password_reset.message: You requested a password reset for your Teambee account. Click the button below to create a new password.
password_reset.expiry_notice: This link will expire in 1 hour.
password_reset.fallback_text: If the button above doesn't work, you can copy and paste this link into your browser:
password_reset.ignore_message: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
password_reset.plain_text:
Dear User,

You requested a password reset for your Teambee account.

Please click the following link to reset your password:
{reset_link}

This link will expire in 1 hour.

If you did not request this password reset, please ignore this email.

Best regards,
The Teambee Team

registration.subject: Teambee - Registration Invitation for {club_name}
registration.title: Create Your Account for {club_name}
registration.message: You have been invited to create an account for {club_name} on Teambee. Join our platform to access personalized fitness solutions and enhanced member experiences.
registration.expiry_message: This registration link will expire in 24 hours. Please complete your registration as soon as possible.
registration.fallback_text: If the button above doesn't work, you can copy and paste this link into your browser:
registration.plain_text:
Dear User,

You have been invited to create an account for {club_name} on Teambee.

Please click the following link to complete your registration:
{registration_link}

This link will expire in 24 hours.

Best regards,
The Teambee Team
registration.password_requirement: Password must be at least 8 characters long

invitation.subject: Teambee - You're invited to join {club_name}
invitation.title: You're Invited to Join {club_name}!
invitation.message: You have been invited by {inviter_email} to join {club_name} on Teambee.
invitation.expiry_message: This invitation will expire in 24 hours.
invitation.fallback_text: If the button above doesn't work, you can copy and paste this link into your browser:
invitation.plain_text:
Dear User,

You have been invited by {inviter_email} to join {club_name} on Teambee.

Please click the following link to create your account:
{registration_link}

This invitation will expire in 24 hours.

Best regards,
The Teambee Team
